    • Method Detail

      • decodeQuery

        public static java.lang.String decodeQuery(java.lang.String queryID)
        If the query is an encoded cached query the cached element is returned. if not the queryID is ecpected to be the query itself.
        Parameters:
        queryID - The query as given as a request parameter to the Pivot control
        Returns:
        The decoded query

      • encodeQuery

        public static java.lang.String encodeQuery(java.lang.String query)
        If Pivot query caching is active, the query is put into the cache and a shorter query ID is returned. If disabled the query is just URL encoded.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to cache
        Returns:
        The URL encoded query of query-ID if cached

      • htmlAnchor

        public XMLBuilder.Element htmlAnchor()
        Description copied from class: FComponent
        a component can choose to create its anchor HTML div, span, etc.. tag via this call. If it does, it can be used in a FContainer. This call may ONLY return a single (i.e. non nested) Element. Inner values are provided by render()
        Overrides:
        htmlAnchor in class FComponent
